Headline: Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted and Addison due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are rrtd via Roosevelt, Paulina, Taylor, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt due to blockage nr Roosevelt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Paulina, Taylor, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
